Published January 6 2015

There's a poop joke in here, somewhere

There's a poop joke in here, somewhere — Bill Gates demonstrates the Omniprocessor, a project that can take human waste and turn it into clean drinking water. A pilot program is scheduled for later this year, in Dakar, Senegal. The things we can do.

Enjoy your day.
